caption.p: Validation of expression levels of IRF3, IFN-α and IFNα-7 in A549 cells infected by IBV. RNAs from IBV-infected A549 cells were analyzed for IRF3 ( a), IFNα ( b) and IFNα-7 ( c) mRNA transcripts using RT-qPCR. Fold changes in transcript levels at the indicated time-point were calculated using the 2-ΔΔCt method so that data were normalized to both the uninfected control and the housekeeping gene GAPDH. Values represent results from three independent experiments. Statistical analysis was performed by Student’s t test. NS, no significant difference; *, P < 0.05; **, P < 0.01; ***, P < 0.001.
